Package homework1

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework1.Account
  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Account()
      This constructor will only be used for the admin of the system, it will check whether the username used more than one or whether account logged out.
      Account​(int Id, java.lang.String Name_, java.lang.String birthDate, java.lang.String location_, Account Administration)
      This constructor takes all the required informations and creates a new account, it sets the isLoggedIn variable to false until account owner logs in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPost​(Post temp)
      This method adds post to account's profile, all posts can be displayed by any account.
      void addToInbox​(Message messageDelivered)
      This method adds the Message object to the inbox of the receiver Account
      void block​(Account Acc)
      The account blocks another account, both account will not be allowed to send a message to other.

      This method displays the number of message(s) in the inbox.

      This method displays the number of message(s) in the outbox.

      Checks whether given account has already followed or not, if not adds the new Account into Following data container and inreases following_count by one.

      This method checks whether a particular account has logged or still active.
      boolean isUserExist​(Account Admin)
      Checks whether the new account's username already in use or not, this operation is performed by Admin's account, it checks all the username that has been created to prevent duplicates
      void listFollowers()
      Displays all the followers of account Note that, Account admin is following all accounts, ant its index is 0, to not count that we should start from index = 1
      void listFollowing()
      Displays all the account that has been followed by this account
      void login()
      Admin Object is following all accounts that are instantiated, therefore if Admin's Account following[100] data container used as a reference to every instantiated object, it will be easy to check which account was logged in or whether any account logged in.
      void logout()
      If user has already logged into account, it logs out from the account.

      This method takes a Message object which contains the details of the message, it checks whether an Account that sends the message is following the receiver account.

      Adds the parameter Account object into Followers data container, and increases the followers_count by one
      void viewInbox()
      This method displays all messages in the inbox, it displays them in order that starts from the most recent message.

      This method displays all the messages in the outbox, it displays them in order that starts from the most recent message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account​(int Id,
               java.lang.String Name_,
               java.lang.String birthDate,
               java.lang.String location_,
               Account Administration)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        This constructor takes all the required informations and creates a new account, it sets the isLoggedIn variable to false until account owner logs in. Checks whether new user is creatable(whether username is already in user or not)
        Parameters:
        Id - Account Id
        Name_ - Account owner's name
        birthDate - Account owner's birthDate
        location_ - Account owner's location
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - ParseException that parses the String that containts the birth date and checks if it is legal or not
        java.lang.Exception - If username is already in use, it will throw an exception to let user know.

      • Account

        public Account()
        This constructor will only be used for the admin of the system, it will check whether the username used more than one or whether account logged out.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public final java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        this.Name Returns the username of Account owner

        Returns:
        Returns the Account ID

        Returns:
        Returns the number followers.

        public final int getFollowing()
        Returns:
        Returns the number of following accounts

      • getFollowing

        public final java.lang.String getFollowing​(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the account owner in the Account Following[100] data container
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the account owner in Account Following[1000] data container

      • getAccount

        public final Account getAccount​(int AccID)
        This method finds an specific account that is registered already, and returns its reference
        Parameters:
        AccID - An integer AccountID of an Account
        Returns:
        Returns reference to the particular Account object whose has ID been given as a parameter, null if it is not exist

      • listFollowers

        public void listFollowers()
        Displays all the followers of account Note that, Account admin is following all accounts, ant its index is 0, to not count that we should start from index = 1

      • listFollowing

        public void listFollowing()
        Displays all the account that has been followed by this account

      • isUserExist

        public boolean isUserExist​(Account Admin)
        Checks whether the new account's username already in use or not, this operation is performed by Admin's account, it checks all the username that has been created to prevent duplicates
        Parameters:
        Admin - Administration : account that has a control over all users
        Returns:
        checkDuplicates : If username has already been used it will return true, false otherwise

      • follow

        public void follow​(Account Acc)
        Checks whether given account has already followed or not, if not adds the new Account into Following data container and inreases following_count by one.
        Parameters:
        Acc - An account that is going to be followed by this account

      • updateFollowers

        public void updateFollowers​(Account Acc)
        Adds the parameter Account object into Followers data container, and increases the followers_count by one
        Parameters:
        Acc - An account that started to follow this account

      • viewProfile

        public void viewProfile​(Account Acc)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Displays the profile of another Account
        Parameters:
        Acc - The Account that is going to be displayed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - To view a profile, the account must be logged in first, otherwise an exception occurs.

      • login

        public void login()
        Admin Object is following all accounts that are instantiated, therefore if Admin's Account following[100] data container used as a reference to every instantiated object, it will be easy to check which account was logged in or whether any account logged in. This function checks is there any other active/logged in account in the system, if current object logs into account, else an error occurs.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        If user has already logged into account, it logs out from the account. If not displays an error message

      • isLoggedOut

        public final boolean isLoggedOut()
        This method checks whether a particular account has logged or still active.
        Returns:
        Returns false, if current instantiations of Account object is still logged in. True otherwise.

      • isAccountFollowed

        public final boolean isAccountFollowed​(int accID)
        Checks whether another account is followed by this account or not.
        Parameters:
        accID - integer Account ID that is going to be checked whether has been followed by his account or not.
        Returns:
        Returns true if parameter Acc has been followed, false otherwise.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(Message messageReceived)
        This method takes a Message object which contains the details of the message, it checks whether an Account that sends the message is following the receiver account. If he/she follows a message will be sent, otherwise an error message display. Checks also if account has been blocked or not.
        Parameters:
        messageReceived - A Message object that contains details about message such as MessageID, message receiver, message sender, message content...

      • addToInbox

        public void addToInbox​(Message messageDelivered)
        This method adds the Message object to the inbox of the receiver Account
        Parameters:
        messageDelivered - A Message object that is going to be put into the Inbox of the Account that receives this message.

      • checkInbox

        public final void checkInbox()
        This method displays the number of message(s) in the inbox.

      • checkOutbox

        public final void checkOutbox()
        This method displays the number of message(s) in the outbox.

      • viewInbox

        public final void viewInbox()
        This method displays all messages in the inbox, it displays them in order that starts from the most recent message.

      • viewOutbox

        public final void viewOutbox()
        This method displays all the messages in the outbox, it displays them in order that starts from the most recent message.

      • addPost

        public void addPost​(Post temp)
        This method adds post to account's profile, all posts can be displayed by any account.
        Parameters:
        temp - A Post object that is going to be shared by this account!

      • viewPosts

        public void viewPosts​(Account AccObject)
        This method is to display another users all posts.
        Parameters:
        Acc - An account whose post are going to be displayed

      • viewPostInteractions

        public void viewPostInteractions​(int postID,
                                 Account AccObject)

      • viewPostInteractions

        public void viewPostInteractions​(Post AccPost)

      • getPostCount

        public final int getPostCount()
        Returns:
        Returns the number of posts shared by this account.

      • block

        public void block​(Account Acc)
        The account blocks another account, both account will not be allowed to send a message to other. They will not view each other's profile either
        Parameters:
        Acc - An account that is going to be blocked.

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked​(Account Acc)
        Checks if Acc has blocked before.
        Returns:
        Returns true if given accout has already been blocked, false otherwise
